• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with real-time synchronization.
  • Procedurally generated infinite map with ore types (coal, iron, gold, diamond, etc.).
  • Upgrade system for drills, hull, fuel, cargo, and special abilities.
  • Mobile-optimized controls with virtual D-pad and action buttons.
  • Save/load system with cloud sync via Puter file system.

Mega Miner Online is a collaborative browser mining game featuring real-time multiplayer, procedurally generated worlds, and extensive upgrade systems. Players can mine various ores, build structures, and manage resources while exploring an infinite underground map. The game includes mobile controls, cloud save functionality, and a shop system for purchasing upgrades and consumables.
